name: Yieldwatch
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: Yieldwatch is a smart yield farming dashboard on Binance Smart Chain that lets you monitor your liquidity pools, yield farming and token staking performance with fast and casual UI, which is optimized for mobile use.
